resources.string: Protects women from domestic abuse through emergency protection orders and restraining measures.
Ensures workplace equality, maternity benefits, and safeguards against gender discrimination.
Address and prevent sexual harassment in various contexts, including workplaces, public spaces and educational institutions.
Addresses crimes related to sexual assault, including rape, statutory rape, and marital rape (in limited circumstances).
Regulates the marriage and divorce of non-Muslim individuals and provides protections for women in family disputes.
Protects Muslim womenâ€™s rights in family matters such as marriage, divorce, and custody.
